revised_title: Vibrations of an Elastic Plate: Modes and Wave Velocities
tldr: The author investigates the vibrations and wave behavior in an elastic plate, providing a comprehensive view of the various modes of vibration and their corresponding wave velocities. The study covers both symmetrical and anti-symmetrical vibrations, with a focus on the more important modes and their characteristics. The findings contribute to the understanding of elastic theory and have implications for seismology and engineering applications.
